scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a central figure, likely Christ, with wounds visible on his torso and hands, wearing a red robe lined with gold. He is surrounded by several figures, some appearing to be onlookers or disciples, with their faces rendered in a stylized manner. The background is a vibrant green, suggesting an outdoor setting with some foliage. The overall composition is dense and somewhat abstract, typical of early medieval manuscript illumination.
